Title: Relates to relocation and employment assistance credits
Summary: Provides for relocation and employment assistance credits in cities with a population of one million or more.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general city law, chapter 772 of the laws of 1966, relating to enabling any city having a population of one million or more to raise tax revenue, and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to authorizing credits for relocation and employment assistance and making available relocation assistance credits per employees
